lyrics:
6 contributorswondering lyricschorus
if you want me to wait i will wait for you
if you tell me to stay i would stay right through
if you dont want to say anything at all
im happy wondering

postchorus
go yeah yeah

verse 1
since i was a young man i never was a fun man
i never had a plan and no security then
ever since i met you i never could forget you
i only want to get you right here next to me

prechorus
because everybody awhaohoh
needs someone that they can trust and
youre somebody awhaohoh
that i found just in time

chorus
if you want me to wait i will wait for you
if you tell me to stay i would stay right through
if you dont want to say anything at all
im happy wondering
you might also likeverse 2
now my life is changing its always rearranging
its always getting stranger than i thought it ever could
ever since i found you i want to be around you
i want to get down to the point that i need you

prechorus
because everybody awhaohoh
needs someone that they can trust and
youre somebody awhaohoh
that i found just in time

chorus
if you want me to wait i will wait for you
if you tell me to stay i would stay right through
if you dont want to say anything at all
im happy wondering

postchorus
go yeah yeah
yeah yeah

bridge
dont tell me the bad news
dont tell me anything at all
just tell me that you need me
and stay right here with me
chorus
